```{r}
summary(data_total)
```

```{r}
dimensions= dim(data_total)
R= dimensions[1]

for(Zeile in 1:R){
  Population <- data_total$population_count[Zeile]
  Infection <- data_total$dengue_cases[Zeile]
  Incidence = (Infection/Population)*100000
  data_total$incidence[Zeile] <- Incidence
}
```
